The '''scoreboard''' is an overlayed information panel available in [[multiplayer]] modes. It identifies each [[player]] (or [[bot]]) by their name and color, and lists how many [[frag]]s (in [[deathmatch]] or kills (in [[cooperative]]) they have. There are three modes to the scoreboard: cooperative, deathmatch, and team deathmatch.
The scoreboard is shown with the {{CCMD|P|+showscores}} or {{CCMD|P|togglescoreboard}} commands.
The appearance of the scoreboard can be customized with {{CVAR|R|Scoreboard|sb_* console variables}}, accessible from the [[scoreboard options]] menu.
A player's color depends on their choice of {{Property|Player.Colorset|color set}} or [[translation]]. <gallery> File:Scoreboard_Coop.png|Cooperative mode. File:Scoreboard_Team.png|Team deathmatch mode. File:Scoreboard_DM.png|Deathmatch mode. </gallery> [[Category:Features]][[Category:Glossary]]
